description.value: A CodeSystem to identify the error associated with the event message.

definition.value: The NHS number provided in the message is not valid (based on being 10 digits long and the 10th digit being a check digit)

display.value: NHS Number Does Not Exist on PDS

definition.value: The NHS number provided in the message does not match on PDS

display.value: NHS Number Does Not Match Name And/Or/Gender And/Or DOB

definition.value: The NHS number provided in the message does not match the name and/or gender and/or DOB on PDS

display.value: Service Not Entitled to Publish Event Type

definition.value: The event type published is not allowed to be published by service

display.value: Supplier not accredited to publish messages

definition.value: The supplier system publishing the message has not been through the accreditation process

display.value: Provider not accredited to publish messages

definition.value: The provider publishing the message has not been through the accreditation process

display.value: Date of Event is after Date of Publication

definition.value: The date of the event is after the date of publication

display.value: Date of Event is before Date of Birth

definition.value: The date of the event is before the date of birth

display.value: Date of Event Cannot Be in the Future

definition.value: The date of the event cannot be in the future

display.value: Date of Event Cannot Be Greater than 3 months after Date of Death

definition.value: The date of the event cannot be greater than 3 months after the date of death
The SNOMED code supplied in the FHIR message does not exsit
Message is not in XML or JSON format
The received event is not a recognised event
The received event does not conform to the associated event type scheme
